### Quick tasks

Compute now the odds ratio of developing colon cancer given high BMI, compared to that given normal or low BMI.

```{r}
myt <- table(data.colon$colon.cancer, data.colon$bmi)
or <- (myt[2, 2]/myt[1, 2])/(myt[2, 1]/myt[1, 1])
or
```
